topComments.author: Joshua Russell
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Come√ßamos a vir aqui no outono de 2021 e decidimos comprar o passe de temporada, eles s√£o muito acess√≠veis. Viemos algumas vezes e fiquei realmente impressionado. Eles t√™m temas diferentes ao longo do ano, o que √© bom ver como eles decoram e comemoram. J√° estivemos no Halloween, no Natal e acabamos de ir ao tema Fiesta. Os tempos de espera foram muito r√°pidos ou inexistentes para todos os passeios. Eles tinham aspersores de √°gua, o que era bom porque estava muito quente! Nossa fam√≠lia aproveitou todos os passeios ao longo do dia. H√° sempre um membro da equipe por perto pronto para ajudar, o que foi muito bom de ver e vimos muitas pessoas limpando o parque durante todo o dia. Eu gostaria que houvesse mais pedidos m√≥veis de comida dispon√≠veis, quando est√°vamos procurando apenas um local estava oferecendo pedidos m√≥veis, ent√£o espero que isso cres√ßa. Grande parque geral para a fam√≠lia!  (Original) We started coming here in the Fall of 2021 and decided to purchase season pass, they are very affordable. We have come a few times and I have been really impressed. They have different themes through the year which is nice to see how they decorate and celebrate. We have been to Halloween, Christmas and just went to the Fiesta theme. The wait times were really fast or nonexistent for all the rides. They had water sprinklers going which was good because it was so hot! Our family enjoyed all the rides throughout the day. There is always a staff member nearby ready to help which was really great to see and we saw a lot of people cleaning the park throughout the day. I do wish there was more mobile food ordering available though, when we were looking only one location was offering mobile orders, so hopefully that will grow. Overall great park for the family!

topComments.author: Alexandra Gross
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Foi muito agradavelmente surpreendido! Achei que seria um parque pequeno e fofo, mas havia muito o que fazer l√°! Os artistas foram absolutamente fant√°sticos e t√£o talentosos em tantos shows diferentes! O parque foi muito bem cuidado e todos os funcion√°rios foram gentis e amig√°veis. Eu sou de NJ e esse Six Flags definitivamente tem o meu ritmo!  (Original) Was very pleasantly surprised! Thought it was going to be a small cute park, but there was SO much to do there! The performers were absolutely fantastic and so talented in so many different shows! The park was very well maintained and all the staff were kind and friendly. I'm from NJ and this Six Flags definitely has mine beat!

topComments.author: Tim Bergstrom
topComments.comment: Great place to take kids in DC for a break from museums and tours. I enjoy museums and tours quite a bit, but let‚Äôs be honest, for kids, they can be little bit like a church service. Six Flags gave my kids and me a break from the usual and gave them a chance to blow off steam. Our favorite rides were Superman, Bat Wing, Joker‚Äôs Jinx and the Firebird. Have fun.

(Original) This is a smaller park for the Six Flags Chain. This was my first time going in 10 years and the park had not really changed. Any new rides added didn't add anything exciting or new. I still gave it a 3 because I do have many memories in this park from Wild World, Adventure World, and Six Flags.

A maioria dos passeios geralmente n√£o era t√£o movimentada, ent√£o todos podem terminar todos os passeios pelo menos, e podem at√© ir por segundos se estiverem interessados. topComments.author: Jeremiah Gore
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Precisa de outra montanha-russa s√≥lida, pois Superman Ride of Steel √© √≥timo, mas onde est√° a montanha-russa n√∫mero 2? Alguns bons passeios pelo parque, incluindo uma montanha-russa divertida constru√≠da em 1917... The Wild One. De longe, este Six Flags tem a equipe mais amig√°vel de qualquer parque Six Flags ... incluindo v√°rios funcion√°rios de n√≠vel de gerente que conhecemos enquanto caminhamos pelo parque. topComments.author: pam wright
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Os passeios eram cevada aberta, rio lento, a piscina com o escorregador roxo, o escorregador roxo e verde, corredeiras renegadas, nevasca de pinguins, quedas de naufr√°gios e mais TUDO QUE N√ÉO ESTAMOS ABERTO! N√£o entendo por que esses passeios n√£o est√£o abertos. Voc√™ paga seu dinheiro para vir aqui, mas n√£o vale a pena porque mais da metade dos passeios n√£o est√£o funcionando. Que pena, sem mencionar que tenho uma associa√ß√£o Diamond Elite, pago 20 $ extras por m√™s para o que idk? Precisa cancelar isso!  Atualiza√ß√£o de 28/06/2022, vou alterar minha classifica√ß√£o de 1 estrela ‚≠êÔ∏è para quatro estrelas ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è Voltei aqui novamente para lhes dar outra chance. Voc√™ pode acreditar que depois de talvez 1-2 anos, finalmente abriu o rio pregui√ßoso. Uau, corredeiras renegadas, nevasca de pinguim, quedas de naufr√°gios, foi aberto hoje. √â bom chegar cedo para conseguir um bom lugar, pedimos comida que estava pronta e condimentos dispon√≠veis. ü§© No entanto, os funcion√°rios s√£o muito jovens e n√£o sabem conversar com pessoas e fam√≠lias. Todos agem como se n√£o quisessem trabalhar.  (Original) Rides were barley open, lazy river, the pool with the purple slide, the purple & green slide, renegade rapids, penguin blizzard, shipwreck falls, & more ALL we‚Äôre NOT OPEN! I don‚Äôt understand why these rides are not open. You pay your money to come here, but it‚Äôs not worth it because more than half of there rides are not operating. What a shame Not to mention I have diamond elite membership, I pay 20$ extra per month for what idk? Need to cancel that!  Update 6/28/2022 im going to change my rating from 1 star ‚≠êÔ∏è to four stars ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è I came back here again to give them another chance. Can you believe it after maybe 1-2 years the finally opened the lazy river.. Wow renegade rapids, penguin blizzard, shipwreck falls, was opened today. It‚Äôs good to arrive early get a good spot, we ordered food it was ready and condiments was available. ü§© However, the staff there are really young and the don‚Äôt know how to talk to people &  families. They all act like they don‚Äôt want to work.

topComments.author: Alejandro RN
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este parque foi uma decep√ß√£o total. Fui l√° pela primeira e √∫ltima vez nesta quarta-feira, 6 de julho, e a primeira coisa que notamos √© o qu√£o vazio estava. No come√ßo est√°vamos empolgados (quase sem filas para passeios!), mas depois come√ßamos a descobrir o motivo disso: este √© o parque de divers√µes mais degradado, mais feio e descuidado que j√° estive. Em todos os lugares que voc√™ virasse, notaria algo sujo, desbotado, enferrujado, manchado, etc. Das portas, √†s paredes, aos passeios e aos pr√≥prios ve√≠culos de montanha-russa. O carro √† nossa frente no passeio do Coringa estava sem parafusos. No passeio da Penguin Blizzard, o funcion√°rio teve que pedir para ajudarmos o barco a subir na √°rea de desembarque, puxando-nos apenas para que depois de voltar ele s√≥ dissesse ‚Äúvoc√™s podem sair agora‚Äù.  O que me leva a uma das cr√≠ticas mais comuns que li aqui sobre este parque: os funcion√°rios e sua atitude com a qual me encontro dif√≠cil concordar. N√£o sei se s√£o as longas horas, os baixos sal√°rios ou o que quer que seja, mas n√£o √© suficiente o que quer que o parque esteja fazendo. Eles s√£o miser√°veis ‚Äã‚Äãe n√£o est√£o ansiosos para ajudar os h√≥spedes. Voc√™ pode dizer a partir de uma milha de dist√¢ncia.  J√° estive em muitos parques e h√° poucas coisas que amo mais do que montanhas-russas, mas aqui aconteceu algo que nunca senti antes: meu prazer com essas montanhas-russas foi severamente afetado por essa nova sensa√ß√£o de ‚Äún√£o tenho 100 anos % de certeza que n√£o vou morrer se eu montar essa coisa‚Äù. Eu nunca senti isso antes! O triste estado de todas as estruturas vistas neste parque me fez duvidar da minha seguran√ßa e acabei pulando ou n√£o repetindo passeios que sem d√∫vida faria na maioria dos outros parques.  Foi a primeira vez da minha esposa em qualquer Six Flags e dizer que ela saiu decepcionada √© um eufemismo. Tive dificuldade em convenc√™-la de que todos os parques Six Flags n√£o s√£o t√£o ruins, mas n√£o posso culp√°-la por pensar isso.  Foi a pior experi√™ncia de parque tem√°tico que n√≥s dois tivemos e eu gostaria de n√£o ter perdido um dia da minha viagem a Washington DC neste parque decadente que parece abandonado e caindo aos peda√ßos.  (Original) This park was an utter disappointment. Went there for my first and last time this Wednesday July 6th and the first thing we noticed is how empty it was. At first we were excited (next to no lines for rides!) but later we started to discover the reason that might be the case: this is the most run down, ugliest, most unkempt amusement park I‚Äôve ever been to. Everywhere you‚Äôd turn you‚Äôd notice something dirty, faded, rusty, stained, etc. From the doors, to the walls, to the rides and roller coaster vehicles themselves. The car in front of us in the Joker ride was missing screws. In the Penguin Blizzard  ride the employee had to ask for us to help the boat climb into the disembarking area by pulling ourselves up only to after we getting back he‚Äôd only say ‚Äúy‚Äôall can leave now‚Äù.  Which brings me to one of the most common criticisms I‚Äôve read here about this park: the employees and their attitude which I find myself hard agreeing with. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs the long hours, the low wages, or what but it‚Äôs not enough whatever the park‚Äôs doing. They‚Äôre miserable and not eager to help guests. You can tell from a mile away.  I‚Äôve been to many parks and there‚Äôs few things I love more than roller coasters but here something happened to me that I‚Äôve never felt before: my enjoyment of these coasters was severely affected by this newfound sense of ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not 100% sure I won‚Äôt die if I ride this thing‚Äù. I‚Äôve never felt that before! The sad state of all the structures seen in this park made me doubt for my safety and I ended up skipping or not repeating rides I would no doubt get on on most other parks.  It was my wife‚Äôs first time at any Six Flags and to say she came out disappointed is an understatement. I had a hard time convincing her that all Six Flags parks are not this bad but I can‚Äôt blame her for thinking this.  It was the worst theme park experience we‚Äôve both have had by a lot and I wish I hadn‚Äôt wasted a day of my trip to Washington DC in this rundown park that looks abandoned and falling apart.
